_sText:
Hey,

this is my second map. This time i worked togheter with Chuck Norris.
The Map has 8 Stages, 6 Jails (5 after finishing the map, 1 after timeleft.), 
and 1 littl bonus in every Stage. Both of us worked on the Stages so every Stage has something of me or Chuck Norris.
System written by me.
Every Team can collect max. 4 bonuses of 8.

------------------------------------------------------------------

How the System works:

When you start at Spawn you can enter only Stage 1 and 2.
If you finish one of the Stages you have to push a button to gain Points.
Also there is a bar that turns around after you pressed the button where you can enable one of the other 6 Stages for ur team.
You get points for every Stage your Team will finish.

Stage 1 = 1 point
Stage 2 = 2 points
Stage 3 = 3 points
...etc.

That means that you can gain max 36 points in one round.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

When the timer is at the end before your team finished you get a weapon depending on how many points you gained.

For example:

9 points = tmp
22 points = p90
26 points = scout

--------------------------------------------------------------------

Special thanks to Exither. He inspired us with surf_injection to the system of this map.

---------------------------------------------------------------------
